utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Guys, guys, I've got great news! Guess what...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, ah, Monica's pregnant?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really? Let's get past the moment.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What's your news?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thank you. I got a job in advertising.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, honey, that's incredible!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Gosh, what's the pay like? Oh, come on people... come on, now, if I don't know who makes the most, how do I know who I like the most! Hey Joey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Actually, it pays nothing. It's an internship.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, that's cool. We have interns at 'Days Of Our Lives'.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Right. So, it'll be the same except...less sex with you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, uh, what kinda stuff do you think they'll have you do there?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, it's a training program, but at the end, they hire the people they like.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's great.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I mean, there's probably gonna be some ground work which will probably stink, you know, grown man getting people coffee is a little humiliating

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Humiliating and noble!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You know, if I didn't already have a job, I think, I would have been really good in advertising.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross, you did not come up with "got milk?"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, I did, I did! I should have written it down!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Where's Chandler? I wanna wish him good luck on his first day. .. and I smelled bacon.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He just left.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who did?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey! You never gonna believe it: she called.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She did?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You got it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I did?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What is she talking about?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know, but it sounds great.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Your agent called. You got that audition.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: With Lennart Haze?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my god, that is great! That is *** for a play on broadway...and in a real theatre, not that little one underneath the dally like last time.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is it a good play?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, it must be, because I read and I didn't understand a singe word.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, and Lennart Haze is starring in it...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, and directing.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He was so good in that movie of MacBeth.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You saw that?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, but...I saw the previews. They played it right before Jackass.

utterance.speaker: Rachel and Joey
utterance.content: Ah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, he's done some amazing works.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, yeah. Oh, I loved him in those cell phone commercials.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know. When the monkey hits him in the face with that giant rubber phone.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! Maybe the monkey will be at the audition!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don't make me more nervous than I already am!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Good morning, everybody.

utterance.speaker: Intern
utterance.content: Can I get you a cup of coffee, Sir?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, no, no, I'm an intern, just like you guys...except for the tie, the briefcase...and the fact that I can rent a car.

utterance.speaker: Intern
utterance.content: Seriously, you're an intern?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, well, I'm kinda heading into a new career direction and, you know, you gotta start at the bottom.

utterance.speaker: Intern
utterance.content: Dude!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Right. Look, I know I'm a little bit older than you guys, but it's not like I'm Bob Hope

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The comedian? USO?!

utterance.speaker: Intern
utterance.content: Uhm, it's USA, sir.

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: This is Joey Tribbiani. Joey, these are the producers and, as you probably already know, this is Lennart Haze.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It is so amazing to meet you. I'm such a big fan of your work.

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Well, I've...I've been blessed with a...a lot of great roles.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Tell me about it! "Unlimited nights and weekends!"

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: You making fun of me? Because I am not a sell-out. I didn't do that for the money, I believe in those phones. I almost lost a cousin because of bad wireless service.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, I-I-I wasn't making fun of you, honestly, I-I think you were great in those commercials.

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Well, I do bring a certain credibility to the role.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you kiddin'? When they shoot you out of that cannon...

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Peeeeeooooooooch "Hang up that phone!" One take!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: So, shall we read?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, sure.

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Top of act two. This is my entrance. You got it?

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: "What the hell are you still doing here"?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Err, "I think you know".

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: "Bastard"!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "I am what you made me. You know what? I could go right now."

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: "Go, go!"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "I can't. Oh, I want to, long pause, but I can't."

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: I'm sorry, sorry. You're not supposed to say "long pause"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, oh, I thought that was your character's name, you know, I thought you were like an Indian or something, you know with a...

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: No. Thank you so much for coming in. We appreciate it, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah, y-y-you're sure you don't want me to do it again? I could do it with an accent, you know, Southern "I could go right now, maaan!"

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: My god in heaven.

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: You, you gotta be kidding. See, h-he, he can't act. .

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Hey! I-I-I don't care if he's hot, you know. If you want to sleep with him, do it on your own time. This is a play. No, listen: if you insist on this, I will call my agent so fast on a cell phone that has a connection that is so clear he's gonna think I'm next door.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah, hi, ah. Thank you so much for whispering for my benefit, but, ah, look, if you just tell me what I did wrong, I'd just love to work on it and come back and try it again for you. And, and also: 'How you doing?' You should, please, just gimme another chance. I really wanna get better, please.

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Well, if you wanna come back at the end of the day today, here are my notes. Ready?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Uhm, you're in your head. You-you're thinking way too much.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I really doubt that.

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: No, no, no. It's that you're not connected with anything in your body. There's no urgency. The scene is a struggle, uhm, it's a race. Also, what you did was horizontal. Don't be afraid to explore the vertical. And don't learn the words. Let the words learn you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Couldn't I just sleep with the producer?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, do you wanna go to dinner tonight?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I can't. I've got a date with that waitress, Katy, yeah, I know we've been only going out like twice, but I have a really good feeling about her.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I hear divorce bells.

utterance.speaker: Mugger
utterance.content: Alright. Just give me your wallets and there won't be a problem.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Mugger
utterance.content: I have a gun

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: O-ok. Just relax, Phoene, just stay calm. . Oh my god, I can't find my wallet.

utterance.speaker: Mugger
utterance.content: Alright, lady, now give me your purse!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What do you mean "no"? I knew you'd be my death, Phoebe Buffay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Lowell, is that you?

utterance.speaker: Lowell
utterance.content: Phoebe? Oh my god!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my god!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm sorry, Ross, this is my old friend Lowell from the streets. Lowell, Ross.

utterance.speaker: Lowell
utterance.content: Ross, nice to meet you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, a real pleasure.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ah, it's been so long, so long. I can't believe you're still doing this!

utterance.speaker: Lowell
utterance.content: Oh, I know, but I quit smoking!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Good for you!

utterance.speaker: Lowell
utterance.content: So you look like you're doing really well! I guess you're mugging days are behind you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my god. Phoebe, you used to mug people?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Excuse me, Ross, old friends catching up...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, how did the audition go?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, they wanna see me again this afternoon, but, err, well, Lennart Haze did not like me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What happened?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, he said I wasn't urgent enough, you know, and that everything I did was horizontal and I should be more vertical. Oh, and he said that I should think less.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So far so good!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Honey, I'm old!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What's wrong?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I am so much older than these other interns. I can't compete with them.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So you're a little older. Try to look at the positive: You have all this life experience.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, but I don't think life experience with these.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wooooooooow It's like they're on fire!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are they?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: They're these prototype sneakers and come up with ideas on how to sell them which I can't do because no self-respecting adult would ever where these.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'll give you $500 for them!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What am I supposed to do with these?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ah, come on, sneakers are easy. You wear sneakers all the time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, first of all, they're not called "sneakers" anymore. Apparently, they're called "kicks" or "skids" and I think I heard somebody say "slorps". And here, look: they've got these wheels to pop out from the bottom so you can roll around 'cause, apparently, walking is too much exercise. Kids, kids, roll your way to childhood obesity! Would you help me try to sell these?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, have you considered using a girl with huge knockers?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, I don't think that's the kinda thing they're looking for.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, that'd work on me! Why did I get to buy Mrs. Butterwords?

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey, hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, you'll never guess what just happened...Phoebe and I got mugged!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You okay?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, because Phoebe knew the mugger!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How do you know a mugger?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm sorry I have friends outside the six of us.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You wanna know how she knew him? Because Phoebe used to mug people.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Seriously?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I'm not proud of it, but, you know...sometimes when I was living on the street and I needed money for food and stuff I...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, that is awful!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, ok, I wasn't rich like you guys, ok, I didn't eat gold and have a flying pony...I had a hard life, my mother was killed by a drug dealer...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You're mother killed herself!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: She was a drug dealer!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, anyway, it was a good thing Phoebe knew the knew him, because I was about to do some serious damage!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, this must've brought back some really bad memories for you, Ross.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, Ross was mugged as a kid.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You were?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, it was pretty traumatic. I was outside St. Marc's Comics...you know, I-I-I was just there minding my own business, you know, seeing what kinda trouble Spiderman got into that week-

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wonderwoman!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Anyway, I was heading towards this bakery, you know, to pick up a couple of dozen Linzer torts for someone... ...when outta nowhere this thug with a pipe jumps out and says: "Gimme your money, punk!"

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my god...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know! And-and the worst part was they took my backpack which had all the original artwork I had done for my own comic book: "Science Boy"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh yeah! What was his superpower again?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A superhuman thirst for knowledge.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I-I better get to class Are there any more of your friends I should look out for on my way, Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No...actually, you might wanna stay away from Jane street...that's where Stabby Joe works.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, I think we have a problem here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, uhm, back in my mugging days, you know, I, uhm, I worked St. Marc's Comics.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, a pipe was my weapon of choice and, uhm, pre-teen comic book nerds were my meat.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, there was this one kid who had a sticker on his backpack that said-

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Monica
utterance.content: "Geology rocks!"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my god!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know...I mugged Ross!

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: You're late!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know, I'm sorry, but can I just have a quick second to run to the bathroom?

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: No, Lennart doesn't wait!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But I'm bursting with u-hu!

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Joey! Here we go. Let's go very quickly!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Actually, I really need...

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: We must go now, quickly, please.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes...ahahaaa

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Ready? "What the hell are you still doing here?"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "I think you know!"

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: "Oh, you sick bastard!"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "I am what you made me! You know what?"

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: "What?"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "I could go right now."

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: "Then go, go!"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "I, oh, I can't. I want to, but I can't!"

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Cut! That was good. That was very good. You did everything I asked for.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I did?

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Yes. Plus...what you've got that...I don't know what you've got going...this squirmy quality that you bring into the character that I couldn't've even imagined. Wow, hey, here's what we gonna do: come back tomorrow for the final callbacks with the ***, do all of this what you've got going now, but – you know what? – more, more. Can you do that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure, yeah. I don't have time to say thank you because I really gotta go.

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Look at that: still in character, I like it...I plant seeds I can't explain.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Putting on the sneakers...thought I'd get into a younger mindset, you know, to see if it sparked anything...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, anything yet?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, how's this: They're so uncomfortable it's like getting kicked in the nuts for your feet!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Probably wanna know what I'm doing…?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, that seems about right.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yesterday at my audition, I really had to pee, and apparently, having to pee makes me a really good actor. I got a call-back, so I'm drinking everything. Oh, by the way, that egg nog in our fridge was great!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, that was formula.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We gotta get more of that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know what...these aren't half-bad! You should suggest something like these to Ralph Lauren.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, first of all, that's stupid and second of all, I'm not allowed to talk to Ralph.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Alright I feel younger already!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: yeah, I think I broke my hip.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, how was class?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No one ever asked me that, what's wrong?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nothing, I really wanna know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh... Well, uhm, there was actually a rather lively discussion about the Pleistocene...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Alright, nothing is worth this. Uhm, I have a confession to make...uhm, okay, you know, that girl that mugged you when you were a kid...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wh-What are you talking about? It wasn't a girl. It was this huge dude.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You don't have to lie anymore, Ross, I know that it was a fourteen year-old girl.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, it wasn't.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes, it was.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, it wasn't. You don't think I would've defended myself against a fourteen year-old...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: "Gimme your money, punk!"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my god, it was you! I can't believe it, you...you mugged me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, and I'm so, so sorry, Ross, I'm sorry, but, you know, if you think about it, it's kinda neat. I mean, well, it's just that I I've always felt kinda like an outsider, you know, the rest of you have these connections that go way back and, you know, now, you and I have...have a great one!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's not the best!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know, I'm sorry, please forgive me. I don't know what to say...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There's nothing you can say. That was the most humiliating thing that ever happened to me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really? Even more humiliating than...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, let's not do this!

utterance.speaker: Intern
utterance.content: ...and then, at the end of the commercial, the girls get out of the hut tub and start making out with each other!

utterance.speaker: Boss
utterance.content: That's interesting! Just one thought: You didn't mention the shoes. Who's next? Chander...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay... You start on the image of a guy putting on the shoes. He's about my age...

utterance.speaker: Intern
utterance.content: Your age?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: A-huh. So he's rolling down the street and he starts to lose control, you know...maybe he falls...maybe hurts himself. Just then, a kid comes flying by wearing the shoes. He jumps over the old guy and laughs, and the line reads: "Not suitable for adults!"

utterance.speaker: Boss
utterance.content: Chandler, that's great!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, thank you, sir...or man-who's-two-years-younger-than-me

utterance.speaker: Boss
utterance.content: You see? That has a clear selling point. It appeals to our key demographic, it's…. You did you come up with that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't know, I don' I don' know! I was just trying to get into a young mindset, you know, and it just started to flow.

utterance.speaker: Boss
utterance.content: That is great. Good work!

utterance.speaker: Boss
utterance.content: See all of you tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The cold weather hurts my hip!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, Ross! I know you're still mad at me, but can I just talk to you for a second?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sure, go ahead. Whoops, sorry, sure, go ahead.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I just really wanted to apologize again and...and also show you something I think you'll find very exciting.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my god, crap from the street?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Look, Ross, in this box are all the things I got from mugging that I thought were too special to sell...or smoke. Anyway, I was looking through it and I found "Science Boy"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my god. I never thought I'd see this again. It's all here. What made you save it all these years?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can't say, I just thought it was really good...and...maybe would be worth something some day.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You really thought "Science Boy" was worth saving!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah...but you should know, I also have a jar of vaseline and a cat skull in here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Still...this is amazing...Oh my god, thank you, Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You're welcome. And thank you for "Science Boy". I learned a lot from him

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're welcome.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "I need an answer!"

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: "I-I-I can't tell you somethin' I don't know."

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "You know!"

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: "I don't know!"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "I need an answer now!"

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: "Alright, here, you want an answer...the answer...is…"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: "She never loved me, she only loved you."

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "You knew this all along and you never told me? You never told me? I can never forgive you, I can never forgive myself, I have nothing to live for – Bang – End Scene!"

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Absolutely amazing! The part is yours.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh thanks, thanks! Now, I really have to get...

utterance.speaker: Lennart
utterance.content: Wa-wa-wa-wait! Congratulations! You did it! You did it! You can relax now. Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow, that's a big cable bill! Huh, you don't have a job, but you have no problem ordering porn...on a Saturday afternoon?! I was in the house!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, uhm, Phoebe didn't by any chance mention that...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: ...that she was the huge guy that mugged you? Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I see. You didn't happen to tell...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: ...everybody we know? Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Great. Thanks!
